title: Eight Angles Formed by Parallel Lines and a Transversal
description: Static diagram showing two parallel lines cut by a transversal with all eight angles numbered and labeled, along with a summary of the four special angle pair types.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Geometry
Mathematics
Angles
Parallel Lines
learningObjectives: Identify the eight angles formed when a transversal crosses two parallel lines
Name the four types of special angle pairs (corresponding, alternate interior, alternate exterior, same-side interior)
State which angle pairs are congruent and which are supplementary
